Question: This person's love of wordplay and nonsense with a twist found a wider audience when he was 24.
Hints: "I knew we were in trouble then", this person said later.
This person was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994.
This person and Ono attended the opening night performance, their second public appearance together to date.
